abstract.para: Comparison of Arctic grayling growth in fertilized and unfertilized reaches of the Kuparuk river, June-August 1986.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: The Kuparuk River. Control zone, 0.0 to -0.9K; Fertilized zone, 2.0 to 3.5 K.

description.para:
Log of changes:
Chris Harvey corrected original gopher file, which included many fish that were tagged once but not recaptured. 486 Yellow was added to the growth file. Several fish had switched zones between captures or had missing weight data; these fish were invalid for growth data and were removed from the file. December 12, 1995.

For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: September 30, 1996 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Chris Harvey DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: Chris Harvey DATE: December 12, 1995

para.literalLayout: The response of fish to fertilization was determined by monitoring adult grayling from control and fertilized river reaches. Adult and juvenile fish within a 1-1.5 km zone in each section were weighed, measured, tagged and released.
Calculations: Variable Formula LCHANGE RECAPL-LENGTH WTCHANGE RECAPWT-WEIGHT

Variable Variable description Precis./units Coded Missing Y/N Values SITE site of measurement y TAG# number on tag n COLOR Color of tag n TAGDATE date fish was tagged DDMMMYY n y LENGTH TL of fish in July .0/cm n VOLUME Volume of fish in July n WEIGHT weight of fish in July 0/g n DATE date fish was captured in July FORC zone fish was in n D/D capture location .0/km n y COMMENT initial capture comment n y RECPDATE date fish recaptured DDMMMYY n y RECAPD/D recapture location .0/km n y RECAPL TL at recapture .0/cm n y RECAPWT weight at recapture 0/g n y LCHANGE change in length .0/cm n y WTCHANGE change in weight 0/g n y RCOMMENT recapture comments n y
